body.p: Girtman was a farm laborer in Laurel County who served in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (USA) during the Civil War. He witnessed the murder of Arnold Kirby.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel, Not Stated, p. 109; Find A Grave, "Alfred Girtman (c1842-c1886)," Memorial #21428630, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=21428630&ref=acom (accessed June 18, 2017); Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 572.
